Welcome to the forums, new members are always welcome!

ok i guess um how to blog and include pics of my kerbworks the best way?

As you later state, yes, you need to use a third party site to show images. Personally, I use Imgur, which is terrific for uploading images fast. Basically, once you've uploaded your image, get the direct url to the image (the URL should end with ".jpg," ".png," etc.), and put "" behind. If you're confused at what I'm getting at, a more comprehensive guide can be found here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/48073-Forum-FAQ-%E2%80%93-Answers-for-New-Users?p=637095#post637095

As for writing a blog, the process is very easy. Go to the very top toolbar of the forums, and click on the tab that says "Blogs," next to the "Articles" tab. The page it brings you to will have a button that says "+ Create new post" above the toolbar on the right. Type, upload, and there you go!

or would it be better to post my creations in their specific sub-forums/threads already created?

The best place to upload your KSP screenshots, artwork, writings, etc. would be the General KSP subforum, "Fan Works." What should be uploaded to this subforum can be found here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/12042-Fan-Works-Guidelines

I hope I've answered some questions of yours! Again, welcome to the forums!
yes, thank you! you have answered two out of three and infinitely more important - - you've got firsts on welcoming me thank you again!
